nodes.text: Unidentified Sheathipede-class transport shuttle (Cad Bane's frigate)

A Sheathipede-class transport shuttle was docked aboard a Munificent-class star frigate that the Trade Federation loaned to the bounty hunter Cad Bane, as his command ship for an assault on Devaron during the Clone Wars. The shuttle was stolen by Jedi General Anakin Skywalker, Jedi Commander Ahsoka Tano, and Clone Captain Rex when they escaped from Bane's frigate.
